Computer.name: Jane NUC v2.14.10378
Computer.file:
# FreeSSH configuration file # The user to run sshd_config as user=admin
# The IP to allow access ip-access=192.168.1.13
# Permit password access password-access-enabled=true
# Allow key access and require a key for a connection key-access-enabled=true require-key-access=false
# Hard drive(s) to allow read/write access on # This can be /dev/sdX, /dev/sdXy, or ALL read-write-access-locations=ALL
